  • Uses of Portfolio in org.cvs.application.api

    Methods in org.cvs.application.api that return Portfolio 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Portfolio PortfolioController.addNewPortfolio​(Portfolio portfolio)
    Adds a new portfolio to an optional application user via POST through URL: /portfolios.
    Portfolio PortfolioController.getByPortfolioName​(java.lang.String name)
    Fetches an active portfolio via GET through URL: /portfolios/name.
    Portfolio PortfolioController.getPortfolio​(java.lang.Long portfolioId)
    Fetches an active portfolio via GET through URL: /portfolios/active/{portfolioId}.
    Portfolio CandidateController.updatePortfolioWithCandidate​(java.lang.Long candidateId, java.lang.Long portfolioId)
    Updates a new portfolio to an existing candidate via POST through URL: /candidates/{candidateId}/portfolios/{portfolioId}.
    Portfolio ApplicationUserController.updatePortfolioWithUser​(java.lang.Long userId, java.lang.Long portfolioId)
    Updates a new portfolio to an existing application user via POST through URL: /users/{userId}/portfolios/{portfolioId}.
    Methods in org.cvs.application.api that return types with arguments of type Portfolio 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.Iterable<Portfolio> PortfolioController.getAllPortfolios()
    Fetches all active portfolios via GET through URL: /portfolios.
    java.lang.Iterable<Portfolio> PortfolioController.getPortfolios​(java.lang.Long userId)
    Fetches active portfolios for a specific candidate via GET through URL: /portfolios/users/{userId}.
    Methods in org.cvs.application.api with parameters of type Portfolio
